movies.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
movies.body: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

movies.title: Captain America: Civil War
movies.body: Political interference in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between former allies Captain America and Iron Man.

movies.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
movies.body: With the emergence of the world's first mutant, Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan.

movies.title: Suicide Squad
movies.body: A secret government agency recruits imprisoned supervillains to execute dangerous black ops missions in exchange for clemency.

movies.title: A Hologram for the King
movies.body: A failed American businessman looks to recoup his losses by traveling to Saudi Arabia and selling his idea to a wealthy monarch.
